messages.msgSnippet: Hi Elliot; The site is up to date right now. Everything listed is available for sale. All the best, John ... From: Elliott To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
messages.messageBody:
Hi Elliot;

The site is up to date right now.

Everything listed is available for sale.

All the best,

John
----- Original Message -----
From: Elliott
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, March 26, 2007 10:24 AM
Subject: [nihontostudy] just a question.....


John,

I always visit your web site to view your latest items for sale. My
question is.....when you sell something, why don't you remove it from
your site?

Thanks,

Elliott
